name: Toon Zombie
description:
You are the zombie and your friends have been captured by the King and killed for sport in the gladiators arena. It is up to you to make your way to the arena and defeat the kings minions to free your friends. 

(This is a very short demo showcasing the current features of the game. In the demo you have to kill the king to win. There is a secret extra life you can get if you find your way to it, if not you have to start demo over. In this game I concentrate on more classic gameplay style where you have x amount of lives, you run out  its game over so lives are essential.)
